rg.name: Irvin Perline
rg.affiliation: Arizona State University | ASU, Arizona State University

works.title: An inexpensive mouse urine collection system
abstract: Research often necessitates the collection of urine samples. An inexpensive apparatus has been devised for the collection of urine from individual or small groups of mice, and is recommended for general use when other more expensive metabolism cages are not budgeted.

works.title: Tubular Plexiglas maze
abstract: A modular maze constructed of Plexiglas tubing, reduces angles, minimizes extraneous sniffing, facilitates cleaning, and offers maximal homogeneity of construction while allowing the design of mazes of varying complexity by the simple addition of modular components. It is easily standardized to facilitate more direct comparison of results between l...

works.title: Controlling maladaptive classroom behavior in the severely retarded
An Inexpensive Device to Measure Activity in Crib-Confined Subjects
abstract: An activity recording device has been designed for use with non-ambulatory patients. The device may be constructed inexpensively with minimal time requirements and may be regulated to greater or lessor movements of the subject.
